text: 1. Hi Anthony Perez, Please follow these steps to fix your issues   1. Press CMD + SHIFT + P in VS Code to open the command prompt.  2. Search for and select the command "Preferences: Open User Settings".  3. Choose either the "User" or "Workspace" tab to apply these settings.  4. In "Search settings", look up "files. associations".  5. Select "Add Item" and add these file associations: `*.html: html-hubl` and `*.css: css-hubl`.
